body: Hi all, I think there is an error in the component description of RTRadiationAnalysis. Hovering over radiation result gives units of 'Wh/m2'. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XnAxcylq3ih3JwtAfno9bDZpRlkZkY5cHzhIugt9-Go5HjMi1eDeaCp9NcM21TT0OS-I*oDP1G6tSCxb1f2eNZoHozLc*hlY/ladybugerror.png)However, the magnitude of results being outputted from this component seem far too small to be in Wh/m2. Should it be kWh/m2? As a comparison, the output 'radiationOutput' in component 'radiationAnalysis' returns values in kWh/m2 too, which is why I think it should be kWh/m2 in both components.

replies.body: Hi James, Thank you for letting us know. This is indeed a bug. The units of the results are the same as the original component. It is fixed now.
